raw_body: Darling wife of Terrence (Ex Central Bank), beloved sister of Dr. Greg and Sulochana, Selvarani and late John, late Rukmani and Camillus, late Rev. Sister Benedict (Salvatorian Order), Dr. Maxie and Prof. Rohini, Tarci and Thangam, Vino and late Kingsley, Delain and late Ravi, sister-in-law of late Quinton and Marlene, Maureen and late Shelton, Benny and Maryse, Anton and late Genevieve, passed away peacefully on 25th March 2024. Remains lie at N
